Key:
(A voice calling Tohka's name echoes through
the campus. Whose is it? She doesn't look like
a student here.)

Do you have time after school today? I found
a really yummy shop.
What? Is that true?! What sort of shop?!

It's a bakery. Delicious pastries and it's real
quaint.

Ohh, that sounds wonderful! I will accompany
you!

Huh. So Tohka's made friends with some of
her classmates.

(The two skipped away. Hmm... That's
precious.)
I hope Tohka makes a lot of new friends.

(Maybe next time, I'll ask her to tell me all
about the bakery.)
